session.authenticate-explanation: Authenticate using one of the following authentication methods:
session.offline-subheading: You are no longer connected to the collaboration server.
session.offline-reasons: This can happen when the server is restarting or when you have lost internet connection entirely.
session.offline-explanation: Don't worry, though! You can still edit the document. Once you are online again, your changes will be submitted automatically.

editor.choose-editor-explanation: Choose one of the following editors for collaborating on {type} documents
editor.not-found-explanation: It seems we can't find your document. Sorry.
editor.load-error-explanation: An unexpected error occurred while loading the editor. Please try again.

oauth.authorization-explanation: The application at {app_url} wants access to the following functionality of your hive.js account:
oauth.question: Do you want to grant access?
oauth.warning-explanation: The application is communicating via an insecure protocol!
